name: Trash Man (polpanu)
description:
Trash Man This game made for Trijam #194: The 3 hour game jams Theme is "Recycling is essential!" but my work is overtime because i'm a newbie. i can't calculate the scale of game and slow coding but this game give me a lot of  experience

Gameplay is about heroes name trashman! and his friend "The earth" both help each other to fight monsters. trashman is fighter his weapons is "trash" and when he's  injured "The earth" will heal him with it life. when ever trashman is recycle his trash "the earth" got healing too !

How to Play
W A S D or Arrow Key for Move 
Left-Click to throw trash 
Just fight monster, do recycle, keep earth full HP for Score !!
(you can read in-game guide for more information)

Team Member
Polpanu Serajit - Developer | Game Design
Staryu Jongjumroenwong (Pa-Dow)  - Artist | Character Design
Chawakorn Tongkhamkhaw (DelsinSkip) - Artist | Character Design
